alert.note: Alert for Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 08 at 3:20AM PST until November 08 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley and Santa Monica Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. This includes Kanan, Malibu Canyon, Topanga, and Decker Canyon Roads in the Santa Monica Mountains, and Interstate 5 and Highways 14 and 126 in the Santa Clarita Valley. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains
